verbose_text: While the flmF2 (glucosamine addition) and flmK (both mannose and glucosamine addition) genes showed reduced transcription in the Ft LVSG strain consistent with the reduced lipid A modification, mutants in these genes in Ft LVS did not result in the small colony or gray phenotype on plates nor were the mutants defective in intramacrophage survival.
evidence: flmK (both mannose and glucosamine addition) genes showed reduced transcription
